Posts.Content: Sep 30, 2009 02:13AM Ina wrote: Nancy, I am so sorry to hear of your troubles.  Since the decision about the child is out of your hands right now, I hope you will take good care of yourself. Of course it's your decision, but if you take the disability you can spend time nurturing and caring for yourself, your husband and your other family members. Do what you love--if you have a creative outlet, go for it! I know you are heartbroken now--I could not have children because of endometriosis, and it's a sadness that doesn't go away.  But there is beauty in life every day, all around. Ina
